ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: The wonderfull world of twinking. In a way I dont care if people do this, I have seen lvl 15 in oracle robes which are found of of lvl 40ish mobs I think. But,
ygData.messageBody:
The wonderfull world of twinking. In a way I dont care if people do this, I have seen lvl 15 in oracle robes which are found of of lvl 40ish mobs I think. But, what I dont like is how guilds "take over" an item spawn site to supply all of their lower lvls with items takeing away the chacne that others have to get the items.
-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert <smartass@...>
To: EQ_Wizards <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 4:47 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


i was in the bank at freeport today when i saw the most horrifying thing i've ever seen. a LEVEL TWO erudite magician (how'd she get there??) with a FLOWING BLACK ROBE and RUNED TOTEM STAFF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

this should be against the rules
